treatment.description: Rosettes each with 40–70 leaves at maturity, light green to yellowish, round-topped. Leaves 19–46 × 1.2–2 cm; margins edentate, or denticulate only near and at base. Flowers 2.1–2.8 cm; limb lobes 8–10 mm; filaments 1.2–1.7 cm; ovary 1–1.6 cm. 2n = 120.
treatment.habitat: open gravelly to rocky limestone or basalt slopes
